name: Classic White Tee
longDesc: 100% cotton. Regular fit. Durable collar. Machine-washable. Perfect for everyday wear.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
shortDesc: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation.
longDesc: Premium wireless headphones featuring active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Organic Green Tea
longDesc: Hand-picked organic green tea leaves from the finest gardens. Rich in antioxidants and provides a smooth, refreshing taste.

name: Denim Jacket
shortDesc: Classic denim jacket with modern fit.
longDesc: Stylish denim jacket made from premium cotton denim. Features a classic collar design with multiple pockets and durable construction.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
shortDesc: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitor.
longDesc: Comprehensive fitness watch with GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant design perfect for all activities.

name: Artisan Coffee Beans
shortDesc: Single-origin coffee beans from premium farms.
longDesc: Carefully selected single-origin coffee beans roasted to perfection. Rich flavor profile with notes of chocolate and caramel.

name: Canvas Sneakers
shortDesc: Comfortable canvas sneakers for everyday wear.
longDesc: Classic canvas sneakers with comfortable rubber sole and breathable upper. Perfect for casual outings and daily activities.

name: Portable Power Bank
shortDesc: High-capacity power bank with fast charging.
longDesc: 20000mAh power bank with fast charging technology. Features multiple USB ports and LED indicators. Perfect for travel and emergencies.

name: Leather Wallet
shortDesc: Genuine leather wallet with multiple card slots.
longDesc: Handcrafted genuine leather wallet with RFID blocking technology. Features multiple card slots, cash compartment, and coin pocket.

name: Yoga Mat
shortDesc: Non-slip yoga mat with carrying strap.
longDesc: Premium non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Extra thick for comfort and includes a carrying strap for easy transport.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug
shortDesc: Handcrafted ceramic mug with ergonomic handle.
longDesc: Beautiful handcrafted ceramic coffee mug with a comfortable handle and smooth finish. Perfect for your morning coffee or tea.

name: Wireless Mouse
shortDesc: Ergonomic wireless mouse with long battery life.
longDesc: Comfortable wireless mouse with ergonomic design and precision tracking. Features long battery life and quiet clicking mechanism.
